content: Monitor Visual Block Creator Interface (React components) - includes drag-drop, live preview, property panels
Monitor REST API endpoints and backend logic - includes block CRUD, template management, validation
Monitor Database schema and data management - includes block storage, relationships, migrations
Monitor CSS styling and responsive design - includes admin interface, block rendering, mobile optimization
Monitor Block template system - includes predefined templates, custom templates, import/export
Monitor Testing and documentation - includes unit tests, integration tests, user documentation
Create comprehensive progress dashboard with real-time status tracking
Create dependency mapping between all components and identify critical paths
Define quality checkpoints and acceptance criteria for each deliverable
Create integration testing plan with phased rollout strategy
Establish timeline and milestone tracking with delivery estimates
Create agent coordination protocols and communication standards
Initialize project directory structure and development environment setup
